## CardsReader.enumerateReaders() method

Lists all connected card readers.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
enumerateReaders(): Promise<string[]>;
```
<b>Returns:</b>

`Promise<string[]>`

a promise to return a list of card reader names.
